imdb.plot outline: This annual series ran in the lead up to Live Nation's Download Festival in the UK with a feature length episode covering the whole weekend live event as the final episode. Presenter Terry 'Beez' Bezer would stir up excitement for the rock festival with weekly magazine shows on Scuzz TV. The show had a mixture of interviews with rock bands, news, comedy sketches and links into music videos. The presenters were often made to do inappropriate things or wound up by the shows producer off camera. Bezer was not present for the final year of the show which only covered the live event itself.
imdb.title: Download Festival: The Lowdown
